name: avsforum.com Snipped Posts and Quotes
description: This style makes long AVSForum.com forum Posts and long inserted Quotes scrollable to the selected maximum height in pixels. For Chrome, Firefox, IE, Opera computer browsers, and Firefox for Android Tablet users I have created browser extensions that snip and more available here http://www.avsforum.com/t/1475892/jrwalkers-avs-forum-browsing-tool-that-shortens-long-forum-posts-and-quotes-without-loss-of-content/0_100#post_23392851 .
